title: Mini-Ep 92: Find Your Wondrous Thing
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 92: Find Your Wondrous Thing
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree receive a voicemail from a listener about reconnecting with a friend they ghosted, discuss press-on nails, debate the necessity of hobbies, and share advice for a listener at a crossroads in her relationship.To leave a voicemail for a...
description:
Kate and Doree receive a voicemail from a listener about reconnecting with a friend they ghosted, discuss press-on nails, debate the necessity of hobbies, and share advice for a listener at a crossroads in her relationship.


To leave a voicemail for a future mini-ep, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • HONEYBOOK - Get 50% off your first year when you go to honeybook.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • KIND - For 25%off your own custom variety pack, visit kindsnacks.com/forever35 and enter FOREVER35 in your shopping cart.
  • THIRDLOVE - Get 15% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.
  • PRETTY LITTER - For 20% off your first order visit prettylitter.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • STITCH FIX - Get started today at stitchfix.com/forever35 and you'll get an extra 25% off when you keep all items in your box.
  • JOYBIRD - Head to joybird.com/forever35 for 25% off your first order with promo code FOREVER35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
